title: Marjory Stoneman Douglas Quote About Activism?
subtitle: The environmental activist, journalist, and suffragette encouraged people to "be a nuisance" and to "never give up"  — even if discouraged by bad politics.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Marjory Stoneman Douglas encouraged activists to "be a nuisance" and to "never give up" even if discouraged by bad politics.
